string.name: setup_vpn_profile_description
string.comment: Main content on the 'Setup VPN profile' screen

resources.string: "To secure your traffic we need to add an VPN system profile to your phone settings."

string.name: setup_vpn_profile_ok_button
string.comment: Main content on the 'Setup VPN profile' screen

string.name: setup_vpn_profile_privacy_statement
string.comment: Will be shown on the 'Setup VPN profile' screen below the OK button

resources.string: "We\'ll never track, share or restrict any of your activities."
